member.name: P:YICG.Apps.Teams.DigitalKnowBot.Properties.Strings.AskAGuideContent
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to If I return an answer which is not what you're looking for (in other words, BAD) you can always ask an expert to help..

member.name: P:YICG.Apps.Teams.DigitalKnowBot.Properties.Strings.AskAGuideHeader
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Ask an expert.

member.name: P:YICG.Apps.Teams.DigitalKnowBot.Properties.Strings.AskAnExpertButtonText

member.name: P:YICG.Apps.Teams.DigitalKnowBot.Properties.Strings.AskAnExpertDisplayText
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Ask an expert.

member.name: P:YICG.Apps.Teams.DigitalKnowBot.Properties.Strings.EndUserCardContent
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Maybe me sending out updates does help, but what can close a ticket the fastest? You being able to message the end user yourself - this way we all can do our part to help the users!.

member.name: P:YICG.Apps.Teams.DigitalKnowBot.Properties.Strings.EndUserCardHeader
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Chat with Users.

member.name: P:YICG.Apps.Teams.DigitalKnowBot.Properties.Strings.FunctionCardContent
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to You can ask a question about this game, _Ganga River Rescue_ and I'll do my best to answer it!.

member.name: P:YICG.Apps.Teams.DigitalKnowBot.Properties.Strings.FunctionCardHeader
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Ask a question.

member.name: P:YICG.Apps.Teams.DigitalKnowBot.Properties.Strings.NotificationCardContent
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to It is my job to alert you whenever there are users requesting for expert help!.

member.name: P:YICG.Apps.Teams.DigitalKnowBot.Properties.Strings.NotificationCardHeader
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Be Notified.

member.name: P:YICG.Apps.Teams.DigitalKnowBot.Properties.Strings.ResponseCardHeaderText
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Here's what I found:.

member.name: P:YICG.Apps.Teams.DigitalKnowBot.Properties.Strings.ShareFeedbackButtonText
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Share Feedback.

member.name: P:YICG.Apps.Teams.DigitalKnowBot.Properties.Strings.ShareFeedbackContent
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to I encourage you to share more feedback about how I'm doing (be kind please), so that I can help you better in the future..

member.name: P:YICG.Apps.Teams.DigitalKnowBot.Properties.Strings.ShareFeedbackDisplayText
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Share Feedback.

member.name: P:YICG.Apps.Teams.DigitalKnowBot.Properties.Strings.TicketSystemCardContent
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to As tickets come in, you have the ability to assign tickets to yourself. While you work on a ticket, I will alert the end user who requests your help of the latest updates.

member.name: P:YICG.Apps.Teams.DigitalKnowBot.Properties.Strings.TicketSystemCardHeader
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Ticket System.

member.name: P:YICG.Apps.Teams.DigitalKnowBot.Properties.Strings.UnrecognizedTeamInputMessage
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Ooook... My 🤖 🧠 cannot understand what you are asking me to do, and I don't think I can do a lot of user specific functions in a team. If you want to ask me a question, talk to me 1:1. Otherwise, click on the tour button at the bottom of this card.

member.name: P:YICG.Apps.Teams.DigitalKnowBot.Properties.Strings.UserWelcomeCardContent
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Hi! I’m the Ganga River Rescue Bot! If you want to know more about what I do, click on _Take a tour_ below..

member.name: P:YICG.Apps.Teams.DigitalKnowBot.Properties.Strings.UserWelcomeCardHeader
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to _Namaste_ 👋👋👋.

member.name: P:YICG.Apps.Teams.DigitalKnowBot.Properties.Strings.WelcomeTeamCardContent
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Namaste team! I'm going to help you with understanding the tickets, assigning them, and connecting you to the knowledge seekers (the end users...). To find out more, click on _Take a tour_ below..
